p: The plaques formed on Vero cells by NIID123 were clearly smaller than those formed by each of the other three strains ( Fig 2A). NIID123 also replicated more slowly than the other three ZIKV strains in Vero cells ( Fig 2B). The growth kinetics of NIID123 and ChibaS36 in C6/36 cells revealed a slower replication rate than that of MR766 and PRVABC59 ( Fig 2C).
